name: @react-native-community/geolocation
description: React Native Geolocation Module for iOS and Android
author: React Native Community

scripts.test: yarn validate:eslint && yarn validate:flow && yarn test:jest

ios.sim.debug.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -project example/ios/GeolocationExample.xcodeproj -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone X' -scheme GeolocationExample -parallelizeTargets -configuration Debug -derivedDataPath example/ios/build  -UseModernBuildSystem=YES | xcpretty -k
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone X

ios.sim.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -project example/ios/GeolocationExample.xcodeproj -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone X' -scheme GeolocationExample -parallelizeTargets -configuration Release -derivedDataPath example/ios/build  -UseModernBuildSystem=YES | xcpretty -k
ios.sim.release.name: iPhone X

android.emu.debug.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && pushd example/android && ./gradlew assembleDebug assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=debug && popd
android.emu.debug.name: TestingAVD

android.emu.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && pushd example/android && ./gradlew assembleRelease assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=release && popd
android.emu.release.name: TestingAVD
